description: Both the illustration (a rural scene with a ruin in the background) and the typeface on the title page differ from the copies at [Ao].8/3.3(4), L.C.2852.A(3), Mas.618(6), Mas.619(12) and Mas.621(19) (a standing figure in military dress). The text is identical.| Dated from external evidence.| Illustration on title page.
